value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|And that's the castle tour! It's a lot to
take in, I know, but you'll learn to find
your way around, I'm sure.$k$pDon't hesitate to ask for anything you
might need, OK? We've got plenty of
supplies to go around.$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, your generosity is
overwhelming. My sincerest thanks
for the warm welcome.$k$p$WmMPID_シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Normal,Face|I must admit that I had my doubts
when we were first summoned
to this foreign place.$k$pNow that I have seen how kind you all
are, however, I can say that it is my
pleasure to be here.$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_F_Normal,Face|I know they're from different worlds,
but seeing other Pallas and Ests is
still difficult to get used to.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|It's an adjustment, for sure, but don't
worry. You'll feel right at home in the
Order of Heroes before you know it!$k$pFor now, take some time to settle in.
I'm looking forward to seeing what
each of you can do on the battlefield!$k$p$WmMPID_パイソン,ch10_22_Python_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|That gathering in the great hall was
quite a sight to behold, wasn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_シルク,ch10_23_Silque_F_Normal,Face|Yes. All of those Heroes, as if pulled
straight from the pages of history...
It took my breath away.$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|To reunite with Sir Clive and the
Zofian royalty would be privilege
enough for me...$k$pBut to stand in the presence of the
Hero-King of Altea is beyond my
wildest expectations.$k$pCatria, you fought alongside the
Hero-King in Archanea, did you not?$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_F_Normal,Face|I did. It was Prince Marth who saved
Macedon, the kingdom I served.$k$pHe is no less exemplary in Askr now
than he was in Archanea then.$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|I can think of no higher honor than to
take up arms alongside the greatest
Heroes of legend.$k$pThe prospect must surely excite even
you, Python!$k$p$WmMPID_パイソン,ch10_22_Python_M_Normal,Face|Honor, eh? Big deal. Honor ever kept
you warm? Filled your belly?$k$pCrivens, if you had any sense, you'd
let nobles solve their own problems
instead of begging them to use you.$k$pBut I guess you think if you do their
dirty work they'll let you join their
little club, eh? You never change.$k$p$WmMPID_フォルス,ch10_21_Forsyth_M_Normal,Face|Python, wait! Ah, it seems I'm not the
only one stuck in my ways...$k$p$WmMPID_外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p
